name: Winter Swat Army Shooting
description:
Play as brave soldier in Winter Swat Army Shooting. War action has triggered between the Winter army swat force and dangerous criminals with your modern sniper vision; Hunt down the terrorists at warzone and fight to defend Winter SWAT army base camp located at mountain top.

Features:
- Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations.
- Tons of thrilling MISSIONS.
- Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS.
- ADDICTING gameplay (FPS).
- EASY and INTUITIVE controls.
- FREE game: play it both on your phone and tablet.
